## QueryFieldLabelFromTuple type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type QueryFieldLabelFromTuple<SK, StrStart extends string = ''> = SK extends readonly [infer A extends string, ...infer B extends string[]] ? QueryFieldLabelFromTuple<B, `${StrStart}And${Capitalize<A>}`> : StrStart;
```
